attributes.action: Abolish council houses being occupied by people who are not prepared to take a job to pay the rent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who live in council houses and who refuse to accept an offered job, be it in industry or community work within 6 months of being unemployed and are classified as healthy enough to do work of some kind, should be given eviction orders and moved to social hostel accommodation thereby freeing up council houses to be occupied by working people with children.
